safetyTips: Delivery will be via DPD who are enforcing contactless deliveries. Collections will also be done whilst adhering to social distancing measures.
name: INNOVATE PRODUCTIONS
description: Innovate Productions are currently designing and producing remote working / homeschooling desks. Our first product is the Etä desk which has been designed to assemble in under a minute, making it perfect for those with limited space when working or studying from home. These can be delivered by courier or collected from Ashford and Paddock Wood. We offer discount codes for Ashford residents and £5 from each unit sold will go directly to the NHS Charities Together Appeal - Supporting NHS staff and volunteers caring for Covid-19 patients. Available for Delivery or Collection. Order online.
